summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of 2nd Avenue West, from West Prospect Street to West Highland Drive, all in the City of Seattle,, by paving the same with sandstone blocks laid upon a proper concrete foundation, together with armored concrete cubs; by constructing sidewalks and a concrete stairway where necessary; by the construction or reconstruction of such side sewers and water mains as may be necessary for the proper sewerage, drainage, water service and fire protection of said district; by such grading and regrading as may be necessary; all in accordance with Resolution No. 4970, of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improving district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds."
